name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Automation Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing and implementing automation solutions to enhance operational efficiency. Proficient in **PowerShell**, **Bash**, and **Python** for scripting and automation tasks, coupled with a strong understanding of **Ansible**, **Terraform**, and **DSC** for infrastructure as code. Hands-on experience with **Azure** and **Microsoft 365**, alongside expertise in **Git** for version control and **FreshService** and **ServiceNow** for service management.
Skilled in technical documentation and presentation, ensuring clear communication of processes and solutions. Proven ability in problem solving, with a strong background in setting up cloud-native infrastructure and automation workflows. Experienced in compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards.
